<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4562</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Phonics - 6 Worksheet - Short vowel sound ea</string>
            <string language="es">Fonética – 6 Hojas de trabajo – sonido de la vocal corta ea</string>
            <string language="ga">Foghrúchán – 6 Bileog Oibre – fuaim ghuta Gearr ea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phonik - Bogen 6 - kurzer Vokalton EA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acoustique - tableau 6 - bruit court ea de 
voyelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Phonics - folha 6 - som curto ea da vogal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Phonics - foglio di lavoro 6 - suono corto ea di 
vocale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Phonics - φύλλο εργασίας 6 - σύντομο φωνήεν υγιές
ea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This resource is suited to pupils with learning difficulties. It is a worksheet on the short vowel sound - ea.</string>
            <string language="es">Este recurso es apropiado para alumnos con dificultades de aprendizaje. Es una hoja de trabajo sobre el sonido de la vocal corta –ea.</string>
            <string language="ga">Feileann an acmhainn seo o dhaltaí le deacrachtaí foghlama. Is bileog oibre é ar fhuaim ghuta gearr – ea.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Hilfsmittel wird zu den Pupillen mit 
erlernenschwierigkeiten entsprochen. Es ist ein Bogen auf dem 
kurzen Vokalton - EA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette ressource est convenue aux pupilles avec des
difficultés d'étude. C'est un tableau sur le bruit court de 
voyelle - ea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este recurso é servido às pupilas com 
dificuldades de aprendizagem. É uma folha no som curto da vogal
- ea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa risorsa è adatta alle pupille con le 
difficoltà imparanti. È un foglio di lavoro sul suono corto di
vocale - ea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς ταιριάζει στους μαθητές
με τις μαθησιακές δυσκολίες. Είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας στο 
σύντομο ήχο φωνήεντος - ea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
